daily_plan_req:
cichengege is kiki's boyfrind. Kiki is cichengege's girlfriend but cichengege also likes Latoya Williams. Tody is Valentine's Day. Kiki walked up to them, tearfully questioning cichengege about why he was with another woman. cichengege felt extremely awkward but tried to comfort Kiki first. After a big argument, the two of them eventually went home in silence at 7:00 PM.
